r2dii.data 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • r2dii

An asset level dataset for demonstration

Source: R/ald_demo.R
ald_demo.Rd

This is a public dataset that may be used for examples and tests.

ald_demo

Format

An object of class spec_tbl_df (inherits from tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) with 17368 rows and 13 columns.

See also

data_dictionary

Other demo datasets: data_dictionary(), iso_codes, loanbook_demo, overwrite_demo, region_isos, scenario_demo

Examples

ald_demo
#> # A tibble: 17,368 x 13
#>    name_company sector technology production_unit  year production
#>    <chr>        <chr>  <chr>      <chr>           <dbl>      <dbl>
#>  1 aba hydropo… power  hydrocap   MW               2013    133340.
#>  2 aba hydropo… power  hydrocap   MW               2014    131582.
#>  3 aba hydropo… power  hydrocap   MW               2015    129824.
#>  4 aba hydropo… power  hydrocap   MW               2016    128065.
#>  5 aba hydropo… power  hydrocap   MW               2017    126307.
#>  6 aba hydropo… power  hydrocap   MW               2018    124549.
